text: Det brenner i natt! is a 1955 Norwegian drama movie directed by Arne Skouen and starring Claes Gill, Elisabeth Bang, Harald Heide Steen, Gudrun Waadeland, Thor Hjorth-Jenssen, Helge Essmar, Harald Aimarsen. == Other websites == * Category:1955 drama movies Category:Norwegian drama movies Category:Movies directed by Arne Skouen
title: Det brenner i natt!
